introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.p1: Welcome to BookNest. We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. This privacy policy will inform you about how we handle your personal data when you use our book management platform.

informationCollected.title: Information We Collect
informationCollected.p1: We collect the following types of information:
list: Books you upload or add to the platform
Your favorite books and reading preferences
Comments and reactions you make on books
Usage data and interactions with the platform

howWeUse.title: How We Use Your Information
list: Enable you to share and discover books
Communicate with you about updates and features

dataStorage.title: Data Storage
dataStorage.p1: Your data is securely stored in a centralized database on our servers. This includes your account details, book library, and activity logs. We use industry-standard security measures to protect this information. Your data will persist even if you clear your browser's local storage.

dataSharing.title: Data Sharing
dataSharing.p1: We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to third parties. Your data remains private and is only used to provide you with the BookNest service.

cookies.title: Local Storage and Tracking
cookies.p1: BookNest uses your browser's **localStorage** to securely store your user authentication token and basic user details, which is essential for maintaining your logged-in state. We do not use third-party tracking cookies or analytics tools.

childrensPrivacy.title: Children's Privacy
childrensPrivacy.p1: BookNest is not intended for children under 13 years of age. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13.

changes.title: Changes to This Policy
changes.p1: We may update our privacy policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new privacy policy on this page and updating the "Last updated" date.
